accrueInterest().details: Updates total borrow assets based on elapsed time and interest rate

returns._0: Address of the user's position contract

returns.userAmount: Amount received by the user after fees

returns._0: Address of the newly created position contract

params._borrower: Address of the borrower to liquidate

returns.userBorrowAssets: Total borrow assets of the user
returns.userPosition: Address of the user's position contract

returns._0: Amount values related to repayment (implementation specific)

params._user: Address of the user supplying liquidity

returns.shares: Number of shares minted to the user

returns._0: Number of borrow shares owned by the user

params._user: Address of the user withdrawing liquidity

accrueInterest().notice: Accrues interest for the lending pool

addressPositions(address).notice: Returns the position contract address for a user

borrowDebt(uint256,address).notice: Borrows debt from the lending pool

borrowToken().notice: Returns the address of the borrow token

collateralToken().notice: Returns the address of the collateral token

createPosition(address).notice: Creates a position contract for a user

factory().notice: Returns the address of the factory contract

lastAccrued().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last interest accrual

lendingPool().notice: Returns the address of the associated lending pool

sharesToken().notice: Returns the address of the shares token

supplyLiquidity(uint256,address).notice: Supplies liquidity to the lending pool

totalBorrowAssets().notice: Returns the total assets borrowed from the lending pool

totalBorrowShares().notice: Returns the total shares representing borrowed assets

totalReserveAssets().notice: Returns the total reserve assets in the pool

totalSupplyAssets().notice: Returns the total assets supplied to the lending pool

userBorrowShares(address).notice: Returns the borrow shares for a specific user

withdrawLiquidity(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws liquidity from the lending pool
